name: insurance
description: Type of insurance. Valid codes: 1=Medicaid (or Medi-Cal for CA), 2=Medicare, 3=Medicaid+Medicare, 4=Other US public (non-Medicaid/Medicare), 5=Veteran's Administration Medical Benefits, 6=Canadian publicly-funded provincial health care plan, 7=Private or commercial health insurance, 8=Self pay/none (including Ryan White/ADAP), 9=Worker's Comp, 99=Unknown. You may submit either the numeric or text value.

name: insuranceStartDate
description: Start date of insurance coverage or the date the insurance information was collected.

name: insuranceStopDate
description: Stop date of insurance coverage. Leave blank if coverage is ongoing.
